title: Group/Project/Organization Schema
description: A schema to add regenerative economy Groups, Projects and Organizations to the Murmurations Index

name.title: Group/Project/Organization Name
name.description: The full name of the group, project or organization

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: The familiar name of the group, project or organization

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the group (e.g., https://my-group.org or https://some-host.net/my-org)

tags.title: Tags/Type
tags.description: Keywords that describe the group such as its type, searchable in the Murmurations index

urls.title: Other URLs
urls.description: URLs for the group's other websites, social media, etc.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the group

mission.title: Mission/Purpose
mission.description: A short statement of why the group exists and its goals

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the group

full_address.title: Full Address
full_address.description: The complete address of the group in a single text field as you would write it on an envelope, including the street address, city, postal code, country, etc.

country_iso_3166.title: Country (2 letters)
country_iso_3166.description: The two-letter country code according to the ISO 3166-1 standard where the group is located

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the group

image.title: Image/Logo
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://) for the group's logo, preferably a square

images.title: Other images
images.description: URLs for other images (starting with https:// or http://)

rss.title: RSS URL
rss.description: A URL (starting with https:// or http://) for the Really Simple Syndication feed for the group (usually found at a URL such as https://my-group.org/feed)

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: A list of relationships between this group (the subject) and various other entities (objects)

starts_at.title: Start Date/Time
starts_at.description: The date and time the group was created (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

ends_at.title: End Date/Time
ends_at.description: The date and time the group ceased to exist (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The contact details for the group

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the group is defined by the sphere of the group's activities

schema.name: organizations_schema-v1.0.0
schema.purpose: To map Groups, Projects and Organizations within the regenerative economy
